description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Most zombie games are about survival. Not this one. These zombies are hungry but they're not stupid and will try to escape. Your job is to stop that. Cruelty is rewarded. Mercy is punished. Play by yourself or with a friend to see who is the meanest zombie killer!
